Conclusion: Political parties should be brought under RTI (Right to Information) Act
Premise: Under the IT Act, political parties do not need to disclose donations that they get below INR 20,000. There is a high possibility that the political parties use this loophole to their advantage.

The highest level of particulate matter recorded in Delhi was 2.5 in the year 2016, which indeed made Delhi the most polluted city in the world in terms of air pollution. The “Central Pollution Control Board” also stated that the level of sulfur dioxide in the air gets tremendously high between 9 p.m. till midnight during Deepavali.

Conclusion: Kids' reality shows should be banned

Conclusion: Triple Talaq should be abolished
Premise: Triple Talaq is a provision in Islamic personal law that allows men to divorce their wives by saying Talaq three times. Triple Talaq violates fundamental rights such as the right to equality, the right to non-discrimination, and the right to live with dignity because this provision is available only for men and not women. Women are subjected to live in fear of being unilaterally divorced by their husbands. This violates their right to live with dignity.

Conclusion: Triple Talaq should be abolished
Premise: Triple Talaq does not follow Quranic guidelines of discussion, arbitration to settle disputes, witnesses to divorce, the specified time period to reconcile, or even a genuine attempt to resolve differences.

Conclusion: The Sabarimala verdict is progressive and not a threat to traditions

This is especially the case for courts. Several member states' high courts have declared the ECJ ultra vires (acting beyond its powers). This lawlessness on the part of federalist institutions must stop with immediate effect, and we must reaffirm the principles of subsidiarity and conferral.

Conclusion: We should promote Zero Budget Natural Farming all over India

But it requires large amounts of manure & vermicompost. So, organic farming is quite expensive. But the Zero-Budget Natural Farming approach will require very fewer input costs and restores soil health and produces highly nutritious food.
